page.title: 19OUR HOUSE
page.content: Our house is a detached bungalow. It overlooks a number of fields and is built of stone that is sandblasted to clean it. It has five bedrooms and two bathrooms one of which will soon have a shower and the other another toilet. There is a dining roon and kitchen and also a living room. We have a large garden that is hard to keep up to even with two lawn mowers and a strimmer. There is a garage and a greenhouse and it has a long drive that can cause problems in a bad winter. My father and grandfather are making alterations and I help to mix concrete and put it in the wheelbarrow and cart it around. I also use the lawnmowers to cut the grass for my parents. The lawnmower is quite powerful. I often have to jog after the wheeled one but the Flymo is hard to push because it is petrol powered. {DAMIAN GAVAGHAN ST.MARY'S
